text: Hippopotamidae is a group of even-toed ungulate mammals. There are two living species of Hippopotamus. ==Taxonomy== * Family Hippopotamidae ** Hippopotamus (Hippopotamus amphibius) ** Pygmy Hippopotamus (Hexaprotodon liberiensis or Choeropsis liberiensis) == Other websites == Category:Even-toed ungulates
title: Hippopotamidae
